Articles.Content:
EFECO! Manufacturer of the most ROBUST spacecraft, but that doesn't matter if you can't get something off of the ground. Watch in terror at the missions of brave probes, one or two kerbonauts, along with the deadly BUDGET CUT! This is the EfeCo mission log.

Here at EfeCo, we enjoy naming our programs after building materials. Why? Because that's what we use to build our rockets.

Current Missions-

Ceramic (1)

MISSION: CERAMIC 1

GOAL: Get a satellite around a 100 km orbit above Kerbin.

A shot of the craft that will hopefully do the task:

LAUNCH! Everything is going fine.

The aerospike boosters are decoupled, but disaster strikes when they fly up, knock off the satellite's solar arrays, and cause it to flip out of control.

We're going to land this anyway.

Most of the satellite is back safely, but our mission of getting it into orbit has failed.
